Body:
space = Space([Real(1, 10)])
cons_list = [Single(0, 5.0, 'real')]
cons = Constraints(cons_list, space)
opt = Optimizer(space, 'ET', lhs=True, n_initial_points=2)
opt.tell([1], 0)
with raises(RuntimeError):
    opt.set_constraints(cons)
opt = Optimizer(space, 'ET', lhs=True, n_initial_points=2)
opt.tell([[1], [1]], [0, 0])
opt.set_constraints(cons)
pytest.mark.fast_test
